Package com.gwt.ss.client.loginable

Interface Summary
HasLoginHandler A interface interact with front user for processing login action, and add a LoginHandler to receive login result.
LoginableAsync Interface for asynchronous remoteService descendants have chance to be wrapped as a LoginableService.
LoginableService<T extends LoginableAsync> A wrapper(proxy) for asynchronous remoteService descended from LoginableAsync.
LoginHandler Handler interface for LoginEvent events.
 

Class Summary
AbstractLoginBox Abstract dialogBox for HasLoginHandler.
LoginEvent Represents login process result.
 

Exception Summary
LoginCancelException Whenever user cancel login process occurence.
